name: encvoy-id
description: ** Service Single Sign-On by OpenId Connect.**

scripts.init: concurrently "npm run init:backend" "npm run init:dashboard" "npm run init:widget" "npm run init:oidc" "npm run init:auth"
scripts.prisma:update: npm run prisma:generate && npm run prisma:deploy
scripts.prisma:generate: dotenv -e .local.env -- sh -c 'cd packages/backend && npx prisma generate && cd ../../packages/oidc && npx prisma generate'
scripts.prisma:deploy: dotenv -e .local.env -- sh -c 'cd packages/backend && npx prisma migrate deploy'
scripts.prisma:reset: dotenv -e .local.env -- sh -c 'cd packages/backend && npx prisma migrate reset --force'
scripts.prisma:migrate: dotenv -e .local.env -- sh -c 'cd packages/backend && npx prisma migrate dev --create-only --name $npm_config_name'
scripts.prisma:resolve: dotenv -e .local.env -- sh -c 'cd packages/backend && npx prisma migrate resolve --rolled-back $npm_config_name'
scripts.start:backend: dotenv -e .local.env -- sh -c 'cd packages/backend && npm run start'
scripts.start:dashboard: dotenv -e .local.env -- sh -c 'cd packages/dashboard && npm run start'
scripts.start:oidc: dotenv -e .local.env -- sh -c 'cd packages/oidc && npm run dev'
scripts.start:auth: dotenv -e .local.env -- sh -c 'cd packages/auth && npm run dev'
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:dashboard" "npm run start:widget" "npm run start:oidc" "npm run start:auth"
scripts.nginx:restart: sudo pkill nginx || true && sudo nginx -c $(pwd)/nginx.local.conf

author: Encvoy
